name: CubeTris
description:
CubeTris is a student project created in 2019, our first year of Bachelor's degree in Game Design, where we had to make a game around the mechanics of Tetris.

In CubeTris you have to make combinations of 3 blocks of the same colour. Each time a block is placed on the central square it is rotated 90°. If a block is placed outside the game area, the game is over.

Credits :

  • Pierre Marcos
  • Florent Ledru
  • Titouan Porteau

Controls :

  • Right and left arrows : move block
  • Up arrow : accelerate speed
